com.xith3d.loaders.ase
Class AseNode

java.lang.Object
  com.xith3d.loaders.ase.AseNode
Direct Known Subclasses:
AseFile, AseGeom, AseHelper, AseMap, AseMaterial, AseMesh, AseScene, AseTransform
public class AseNode
extends Object

Base node for all ASE nodes. Any node that inherits from this need only define the method variables and assign them to the parse list and the node will automatically parse itself.

Author:
David Yazel

Constructor Detail

Method Detail

parseProperty

public boolean parseProperty(AseReader in)
This is a generic parser method for any AseNodes. Some might need to override this in order to handle the parse properly (Like MESH_FACENORMAL). Basically this reads a line and if it has a key it is looked up in the properties hash. If it finds a match it then checks the type of the class property using reflection and then parses the input based on type. An example is Color3f. If a property is of type Color3f then it will assume that there will be 3 floats as parameters to this line, in which case it will parse it.
